title: Map of Ancient Egypt and Nubia - identify concepts

content.question: Which of the following statements is true of the area of Africa included on the map?

choices.label: The languages of West, Central, and Southern Africa originated in this area.
Some of the earliest complex, large-scale societies arose in this part of Africa.
The history of this region of Africa is largely undocumented and unknowable.
Kola tree cultivation originated in this region and then spread to the rest of Africa.

content.answer: Some of the earliest complex, large-scale societies arose in this part of Africa.

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
